00034 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetHeaderUpdaterTest );
00035 
00036 #define TEST_FILE "data_file.quantification_updater_test"
00037 
00038 void DataSetHeaderUpdaterTest::setUp()
00039 {
00040 }
00041 
00042 void DataSetHeaderUpdaterTest::CreateReferenceQDFile()
00043 {
00044         CHPQuantificationDetectionData data(TEST_FILE);
00045         data.SetEntryCount(4, 10);
00046 
00047     ParameterNameValueType p;
00048     p.SetName(L"affymetrix-dataset-md5");
00049     p.SetValueAscii("", 128);
00050     data.GetDataSetHeader().AddNameValParam(p);
00051     p.SetName(L"other-param");
00052     p.SetValueAscii("", 128);
00053     data.GetDataSetHeader().AddNameValParam(p);
00054 
00055         CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter *writer = new CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter(data);
00056         ProbeSetQuantificationDetectionData e;
00057 
00058         writer->SeekToDataSet();
00059         e.name = "1";
00060         e.quantification = 10.0f;
00061     e.pvalue = 0.1f;
00062         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00063         e.name = "2";
00064         e.quantification = 20.0f;
00065     e.pvalue = 0.2f;
00066         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00067         e.name = "3";
00068         e.quantification = 30.0f;
00069     e.pvalue = 0.3f;
00070         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00071         e.name = "4";
00072         e.quantification = 40.0f;
00073     e.pvalue = 0.4f;
00074         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00075 
00076         delete writer;
00077 }
00078 
00079 void DataSetHeaderUpdaterTest::CreateReferenceQFile()
00080 {
00081         CHPQuantificationData data(TEST_FILE);
00082         data.SetEntryCount(4, 10);
00083 
00084     ParameterNameValueType p;
00085     p.SetName(L"affymetrix-dataset-md5");
00086     p.SetValueAscii("", 128);
00087     data.GetDataSetHeader().AddNameValParam(p);
00088     p.SetName(L"other-param");
00089     p.SetValueAscii("", 128);
00090     data.GetDataSetHeader().AddNameValParam(p);
00091 
00092         CHPQuantificationFileWriter *writer = new CHPQuantificationFileWriter(data);
00093         ProbeSetQuantificationData e;
00094 
00095         writer->SeekToDataSet();
00096         e.name = "1";
00097         e.quantification = 10.0f;
00098         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00099         e.name = "2";
00100         e.quantification = 20.0f;
00101         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00102         e.name = "3";
00103         e.quantification = 30.0f;
00104         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00105         e.name = "4";
00106         e.quantification = 40.0f;
00107         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00108 
00109         delete writer;
00110 }

00115 
00116 void DataSetHeaderUpdaterTest::testUpdateQDFile()
00117 {
00118         CreateReferenceQDFile();
00119 
00120         CHPQuantificationDetectionData data;
00121         CHPQuantificationDetectionFileReader reader;
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(TEST_FILE));
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00124     DataSetHeader hdr = data.GetDataSetHeader();
00125     data.Clear();
00126 
00127         std::ofstream os;
00128         Fs::aptOpen(os, TEST_FILE, std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::in);
00129     DataSetHeaderUpdater upd(os, hdr);
00130     
00131     ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00132     nvt.SetName(L"affymetrix-dataset-md5");
00133     nvt.SetValueAscii("abc", 128);
00134     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(upd.UpdateParameter(nvt) == true);
00135     nvt.SetName(L"other-param");
00136     nvt.SetValueAscii("xyz", 128);
00137     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(upd.UpdateParameter(nvt) == true);
00138     os.close();
00139 
00140 
00141     nvt.SetName(L"");
00142     nvt.SetValueAscii("");
00143 
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00145     hdr = data.GetDataSetHeader();
00146     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(hdr.FindNameValParam(L"other-param", nvt) == true);
00147     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetValueAscii() == "xyz");
00148     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(hdr.FindNameValParam(L"affymetrix-dataset-md5", nvt) == true);
00149     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetValueAscii() == "abc");
00150 
00151 
00152 }
00153 
00154 void DataSetHeaderUpdaterTest::testUpdateQFile()
00155 {
00156         CreateReferenceQFile();
00157 
00158         CHPQuantificationData data;
00159         CHPQuantificationFileReader reader;
00160         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(TEST_FILE));
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00162     DataSetHeader hdr = data.GetDataSetHeader();
00163     data.Clear();
00164 
00165         std::ofstream os;
00166         Fs::aptOpen(os, TEST_FILE, std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::in);
00167     DataSetHeaderUpdater upd(os, hdr);
00168     
00169     ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00170     nvt.SetName(L"affymetrix-dataset-md5");
00171     nvt.SetValueAscii("abc", 128);
00172     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(upd.UpdateParameter(nvt) == true);
00173     nvt.SetName(L"other-param");
00174     nvt.SetValueAscii("xyz", 128);
00175     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(upd.UpdateParameter(nvt) == true);
00176     os.close();
00177 
00178 
00179     nvt.SetName(L"");
00180     nvt.SetValueAscii("");
00181 
00182         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00183     hdr = data.GetDataSetHeader();
00184     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(hdr.FindNameValParam(L"other-param", nvt) == true);
00185     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetValueAscii() == "xyz");
00186     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(hdr.FindNameValParam(L"affymetrix-dataset-md5", nvt) == true);
00187     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetValueAscii() == "abc");
00188 
00189 
00190 }
